website_summaries.verdict: Most dogs are attracted to these basic rawhide treats, which are worth considering for those with sensitive stomachs.
pros: Made of natural ingredients that are easy for most dogs to digest
Treats don't contain artificial colors or added fillers
Available in small and large sizes and in chicken liver and beef sirloin flavors
cons: Enthusiastic dogs can devour them very quickly

customer_reviews.title: Great chew keeps dogs occupied!
customer_reviews.text: My maltese and pitbull love theses rawhides! As soon as they hear the bag they sit anxiously waiting for their treat. It keeps my pit busy for hours and it take my maltese days to finish hers. They have no digestive issues with these because they are designed for easy digestion. The texture of these also helps clean their teeth. I really like that there is no coloring that would stain the white fur on my maltese.
customer_reviews.author: D. Youatt

customer_reviews.title: my favorite chew
customer_reviews.text: Hi. My name is Sam. I'm a Yorkie with a big chew habit. These are my favorites. When I get a new one, i like to park it at the side of my mouth so it kinda hangs out like a cigar. Mom always laughs and says, "Nice cigar, George!" (Who is George, I wonder.) Mom likes them because they are so digestible. What-ever!
customer_reviews.author: pattyb

customer_reviews.title: Easy on my dogs stomach
customer_reviews.text: I was so upset when their was a recall on digesteezes. I wanted a digestable raw hide like alternative. My friend is an emergency vet tech. She told me the terrible things traditional raw hides can do! These are digestable and my dog loves them! We buy them often! I recommend trying these for your puppy! My dog is a lab mix.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond E.

customer_reviews.title: Not your typical rawhide!
customer_reviews.text: I know rawhide has a bad rep as far as digestion and choking, but I am here to say, my 9# Pom does like these and she has no trouble digesting them. She has not had any issues with chocking, she is a gulper. Can't tell you how many items I have tried trying to find a healthy strong but not too strong chewing bone for her. My vet advises that she needs to chew minimum 10 minutes a day to help with her teeth and gums. These do the trick. She does like variety, but this is one of her favs! Thank you very much!
customer_reviews.author: PurpleKB

customer_reviews.title: Good for Dogs with GI upsets
customer_reviews.text: I had to cut out the rawhide chews for my 1 year old Catahuola puppy - this product was a great alternative. Although he can eat it in less than 10 minutes, its better for his GI problems. He also loves the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Hall

customer_reviews.title: Not as long lasting as traditional rawhide
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these. She will chow one down in under 30 minutes. That being said, even though she loves them, they last about 1/4 the time a traditional rawhide does. And, they are quite a bit more expensive per bone than other retriever rolls. My dog hasn't shown any sensitivity to regular rawhides, so naturally she didn't show any issues with these. If your dog has a sensitive stomach, however, these may be your best bet!
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Danger

customer_reviews.title: my dog LOVES these
customer_reviews.text: Our working farm dog suffered a serious accident as a 12 week old puppy. She needed to be completely still for over 6 weeks! These chew sticks were a life-saver. She loved them and I'm hoping that they really are more digestible than regular rawhide. So far, so good. She's living her life as a 3-legged dog now and still loves the chew sticks when we occasionally give them to her. But... during her injury phase, we gave them to her every day. It was one of her highlights in her day.
customer_reviews.author: XanderFarmTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: These chews rock! Perfect size for little dogs. No upset tummy.
customer_reviews.text: We have a mini-schnauzer weighing just under 12lbs. These chews are perfect for her, as she likes the flavor and can hold them with her paws as she chews. These seem to have a good texture without being too hard. The 'Water Buffalo' flavor doesn't seem to have a distinct odor but our pup loves them. (I would have thought there might have been a slight 'beef' smell to them, but they don't) Low odor to no odor and no upset tummy. Pup is happily occupied for at least 35 mins. Not a long time, but she enjoys them. We do take the treats once they've been chewed down to the last 2 inches or so.
customer_reviews.author: EMK

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love these!
customer_reviews.text: I think it's great that my medium sized dogs love these. One dog chews his rawhide stick fast, gone in less that 10 minutes. He waits for my 15-16 year old dog to eat half and then goes to steal the rest. The only problem is they smell horrible for this human. I have gotten two bags so far and will keep ordering them.
customer_reviews.author: Ricia

customer_reviews.title: Gave our dog bad gas and dog did not like!
customer_reviews.text: Gave our dog bad gas and dog did not like! Bad product will not purchase again. Our dog really didn't go for these and gave her gas. Like monstrous gas. If you buy these buy some air freshener as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Steep

customer_reviews.title: Rawhide for small/medium dogs
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 French bulldogs and this is their 4th bag of these treats. French bulldogs have short, rounded teeth that are not capable to tear through certain raw hides. They can’t really tear anything or take a long time to do so. These are hollow and not thick, so it’s perfect for them. They love to naw on them at night before sleep and it gets them to relax. I’ve never had any digestive issues or teeth/gum damage. There is no odor and are packed very well. It’s an amazing value and one of the few treats my dogs look forward too.
customer_reviews.author: RoRo

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love them
customer_reviews.text: My dogs really like these, and I like that they're easier for them to digest. They're the perfect size for smaller dogs and usually I can get 2 nights of chewing out of one of these for my puppy. Best of all, they ship to my door so I don't have to go to the pet store when I need more.
customer_reviews.author: Cludwig102

customer_reviews.title: Our dog loves these so much, he'd do anything to get just one more (anything)
customer_reviews.text: Our dog loves these things. I mean, he really, really, REALLY loves them. He would jump through fire to get another one. You might even say he's addicted to them. In fact, I wonder if there's, like, some dog equivalent of crack cocaine in them. In any case, he loves them, and they're much, MUCH better for him than regular rawhide. The only place in town that carries these is Petco, and those greedy so-and-so's charge $14.99 per bag. So, nuts to you, Petco, and thanks, Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jason in Wichita

customer_reviews.title: My Dog loves them but..,
customer_reviews.text: I have a 12 pound shih tzu and he loves these. I picked them because they said they were digestible. I hoped that they would last a little longer. One lasts about a day and a half. They do break down well, so I am not worried about intestinal problems, but I can't afford to give my dog one every other day, however much he wishes I could.
customer_reviews.author: Miss F

customer_reviews.title: Price keeps fluctuating which is frustrating
customer_reviews.text: My 8 lb Yorkshire terrier likes them and he doesn’t throw up after he eats them. They last about 2 days. He enjoys chewing on them and I think they are helpful for his chewing needs. My Yorkie has a sensitive stomach and these don’t give him diarrhea and he doesn’t throw up. I don’t know why some people on here say that it made their dog sick but it has never made mine sick. However I do want to complain about why the price keeps fluctuating? I bought at $5.80 now they are $7.50 and it’s only been a couple weeks!?
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Kim

customer_reviews.title: Compromise
customer_reviews.text: First purchased at brick 'n mortar store; now purchasing online/Subscribe and Save due to dangers of unmasked shoppers in a pandemic. These do not last nearly as long as rawhide but that's the point. My dog's digestive system is very slow...rawhide sits inside her for days. These seem to be a good compromise when it comes to occupying her mouth so I can make a few phone calls but not upsetting her system for 3 days.
customer_reviews.author: laraf123

customer_reviews.title: My puppy LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: I can see from the way the rawhide chew is binded together, that it is highly digestible. Seems like lots of webbing pattern on the rawhide. My puppy loves it! However, I did get one batch that was torn on the corner and also found a little "black" spot on the rawhide. I thought it was mold so I called amazon to return the item. But 4 out of 5 perfect rawhide for this price is not bad at all!!!
customer_reviews.author: N3RDgirl

customer_reviews.title: My Dog Wouldn’t Touch These
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know why, but my dog won’t have anything to do with these bones. I’m looking for new bones to try as my dog has grown bored with the same bones and one variety he stopped eating as they started to make him sick. I was hopeful he would like these but one sniff and a head turn each time I tried. At one point he took one only to drop it and stare at me as if I should be able to figure out why.
customer_reviews.author: J. AjakhTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I took the better belly rawhide stick out of the bag she took ...
customer_reviews.text: I have an older dog and she has become very finicky with what she’s eating or chewing. I have been trying all kinds of rawhide for her and nothing seems to make the grade. I took the better belly rawhide stick out of the bag she took it away into the corner of the room and didn’t stop chewing for hours. Thank you Better Belly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These almost killed our dogs. Do not buy these.
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT purchase these - they made all three of our family dogs VERY sick with bloody diarrhea. We spent over $700 on emergency vet bills and have to have all of our carpets professionally cleaned. We had a sick 6 year old lab after she ate one, but did not relate it to the chews. Then our 10 year old Yorkie almost died after eating one of the chews. He is finally getting better. My mother’s dog was sick in a seperate home from a seperate bag of the same chews. Vomit and throwing up.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Lugar

customer_reviews.title: Always ordering these or at PSP for them
customer_reviews.text: My dog LOVES these things and he never pukes them up either. A little pricey and you might find cheaper in a pet store PSP FOr a 5lb Maltese, he eats one every 2 days. (when allowed) they leave a little mess just like any rawhide type product does, but they are gentle on his belly. I switch between these and the same brand "dental" ones and he seems to like both equal.
customer_reviews.author: Reviews4U

customer_reviews.title: Satisfies his need to chew
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what they taste like but my young dog loves them. He grabs it and takes off for some alone time while he gnaws it. Sometimes he will hide it under his bed but it doesn't stay there long before he digs it out and finishes it off.
customer_reviews.author: Dave the Heathen

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I started using these after my puppy had a dental emergency arise from chewing on a buffalo horn that chipped his tooth. The vet recommended rawhides as a safer alternative. My dog (20lb Cavapoo) absolutely loves these and can devour one in around 20-30minutes. I've been through two bags, and he hasn't had any negative side effects yet.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Great Chew
customer_reviews.text: My great pyr pup is constantly chewing on something and these better belly rawhides allow her to get her chew on and I don't have to worry about digestive issues. These haven't led to smell farts or loose stool. Better Belly makes great products and I'm certainly a fan of their rawhides. A great recommendation if your pup likes rawhides but you're afraid of how it is on their stomachs.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Into trash
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a rawhide free chew, these are still made of rawhide but it’s processed to be allegedly more digestible. Didn’t matter because my dog didn’t want anything to do with them... and she is NOT picky
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: and my pupper can chow one down pretty quickly. He loves them
customer_reviews.text: These are a little softer than the usual rawhide type chews, and my pupper can chow one down pretty quickly. He loves them, but they just don't last very long.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bones if your dog has sensitive stomach
customer_reviews.text: Best dog bones esp if your dog gets an upset stomach. I have a new puppy and two dogs and they all can get upset tummies from bones but these are the only ones that don’t bother them. Scared once they get to the end tho they will chock so I take them away... I wouldn’t ever get a smaller size than large tho they aren’t that big
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: My Dog loves these!
customer_reviews.text: Better than rawhide, which get very slimy and is not good for them to eat, I think. These seem to be a better option...
customer_reviews.author: SkyGodSam

customer_reviews.title: They are still raw hide!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these. She would go crazy when I pulled one out. I thought they were safe. My dog got pancreatitis. I believe these caused it. She would cry so loud. I thought she was dying. After blood work and then getting her on antibiotics and off these she is better. She is always looking for them and I feel bad but I cant take a chance. I think these are just as bad as regular raw hide and the vet told me to stop giving them to her.
customer_reviews.author: A New You Body Care

customer_reviews.title: Sharp edges made dog's mouth bleed!
customer_reviews.text: My dog really liked this, but after he stops chewing on it, the chewed ends get very hard and sharp. They made his gums and mouth bleed. DO NOT PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.author: L. Cox

customer_reviews.title: It's ehh
customer_reviews.text: Both of my dogs loved these, but one keeps throwing up after eating part of the bone. I have a father daughter team of dogs, so they are pretty similar. It's the daughter who keeps getting sick, so I'll keep ten just for the dad but I'll look got something else in the future for both of them to enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: kangaroo 1

customer_reviews.title: My lab loves these
customer_reviews.text: My lab has always loved the raw hides so wanted to get her a better more digestible option. These are really good. She not only loves them and the flavor but I feel that it’s a healthier option for her. I’m less worried about a sharp piece breaking off. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sliderguy

customer_reviews.title: Made my dog violently ill
customer_reviews.text: My dog went to town on this bone and then got violently ill! He threw up a huge mound of brown vomit and it immediately took the bone and threw it out. Since discontinuing he has been completely fine and this bone was the only addition to his routine and diet. I don’t know what is in these but never again!
customer_reviews.author: BookHigh

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these. They keep her busy when we need some downtime since she's a very active dog. I also like that they're highly digestible, unlike other rawhide. I would suggest keeping an eye on your dog also wiping them down after their chew-session as it can get a little sticky on their fur and paws.
customer_reviews.author: Tuan H.

customer_reviews.title: Not a lasting chew
customer_reviews.text: My 11 months old doberman puppy finishes one of them in about 2-3 minutes. While they are supposed to be long lasting chews, they are much less long lasting than traditional rawhide items you can find normally. This might work for a light chewer but will be gone too fast when dealing with a larger dog.
customer_reviews.author: Las Vegas Engineer

customer_reviews.title: not thick at all
customer_reviews.text: My puppy is teething right now and occasionally has zoomies so I needed something that was a cure for both. An item that would Keep him occupied and something for his chewing. Sadly this disintegrates super quickly and can be thicker. Not in love with the smell either.
customer_reviews.author: Hennyteee

customer_reviews.title: Your doggo will beg for them
customer_reviews.text: My doggy goes crazy over these! It usually takes him a day and a half to go through a usual piece of raw hide but with this thing he’s done within an hour and a half. It’s much lighter and he seems to prefer this over regular raw hide. You get a lot in a bag as well. I would definitely recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Good on digestion, yet may not last long
customer_reviews.text: Although I like the fact that my little chihuahua-terrier dog can digest these nicely; he can eat it completely in one sitting. Of course, he may be a powerful chewer, but I bought another brand in the past that he couldn't eat so easily, and I think it was because they were more tightly wrapped or formed.
customer_reviews.author: P. Carey

customer_reviews.title: Second time purchasing
customer_reviews.text: Review for 2nd order but just ordered again. Have 6 & 11 no old less than 35pd puppies. Takes a little under an hour for chews. No odor, no mess which is amazing. We never give these or any cheques unsupervised so far no gagging or swallowing and hacking them back up, which is gross. At a little over $4.00 per bag we just ordered 2 more.
customer_reviews.author: Grateful Whit

customer_reviews.title: Doggie addiction
customer_reviews.text: I keep ordering these over and over again. Amazon has a great price for these. I've given these to two different German Shepherds. The chicken is easy on the stomach and they don't smell up the house. Provides a good chew that engages the GSD brain.
customer_reviews.author: Noodler's Pen

customer_reviews.title: Great, but can be a little messy
customer_reviews.text: My 15 lb, cavapoochon loves these! He is a ferocious chewer though and these last him about 15 minutes. Also only a 4 star ,while a great easily digestible chew, they do leave residue on your upholstery, Once dried it can be brushed off. Best if you have your pooch trained to stay off the furniture! Lol!
customer_reviews.author: Terri Duesler

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these. The only down side is they are softer than most other rawhides. My German Shepherd puppy can consume one of these sticks in about 15 minutes or so, other rawhides take her several days but these are her favorite by far
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Lucy LOVES these chews!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these chews by mistake...was actually looking at the Better Belly DENTAL chews. But our lab seems to really enjoy them! It took a couple hours for her to TRY it, but now, she WANTS a chew everyday. The crisp crunch is still good for her teeth!
customer_reviews.author: J. Hatton

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs LOVE these! Our pup has gotten too big for them though and will devour one in less than an hour so we had to get her something more solid. They are still great for our little 15lber who is 14 and is missing a couple of teeth. He loves them.
customer_reviews.author: rvs357

customer_reviews.title: Safe, tasty treats
customer_reviews.text: My pit bull/husky mix loves these things, and I love that I don’t have to worry about him getting hurt when he chews them. However, he’s a powerful chewer and goes through them pretty quickly. I need to see if they come in an even bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dog vomit everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for me three dogs. They seemed very happy. Thirty minutes later all of them were throwing the bones up.
customer_reviews.author: L. Mix

customer_reviews.title: A Better Bite!
customer_reviews.text: Really like these for my three dogs. They don't wear down their teeth, they're better for their digestion, and the dogs love them. Unfortunately I missed buying a bunch when they were on sale! Wish they had a quantity discount for frequent buyers!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made our dog very sick
customer_reviews.text: We have been trying to find a digestible chew for my 170lb English Mastiff ever since a major pet store brand had a recall. After eating two of these Better Belly Chews over the course of one and a half weeks, our Mastiff now has had horrible stomach issues. She is now crying to go out 10+ times a day with some urgency to have small episodes of diarrhea. Last night she woke us up at 2am to go ou (never happened in 6+ years), she is miserable. My husband just took her to the vet for evaluation. This is the only thing she has eaten. Buyer, beware.
customer_reviews.author: DiveDeeper

customer_reviews.title: My pup chose these over Bully Sticks!
customer_reviews.text: My puppy is chew crazy; whether it's soft toys, hard teething toys, or treat chewys like these, she needs something in her mouth or it's my hands. I've tried many different chewy treats; even when she had the choice of a Bully Stick or these, she chose these! They must taste good enough without being too tough on her gums, plus not as hard on her stomach! I'd definitely recommend these and buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L.

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat these for price to time ratio
customer_reviews.text: These keep my dogs busy and are quite affordable. I still can’t get over how expensive some dog chews and treats are but I feel like these are an excellent deal and I don’t have to worry about choking or tummy problems.
customer_reviews.author: MCR

customer_reviews.title: Made my two year old yorkie vomit
customer_reviews.text: After reading a couple of reviews mentioning that this product made other buyer’s dogs sick I chose to ignore and still purchase the product. My 2 year old yorkie did not react well to these bones. He threw up many times after chewing for about an hour and the bones didn’t last long at all. He is small and managed to devour it in about an hour, if that. Please avoid especially if your pup has a sensitive stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Celine Morales

customer_reviews.title: Good for Puppies
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for puppies. They are safe and keep them busy for a awhile. An adult dog might see these as more of a treat than a bone though.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Teething Puppy Loves It
customer_reviews.text: My puppy loves these and they don't upset her tummy or curb her appetite. She is teething and can destroy one of the rolls in 1/2 a day, but it does keep her occupied and doesn't have any ill effects. I would have given it 5 stars if it lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Wylie

customer_reviews.title: Not small
customer_reviews.text: I don't see how they can advertise this as small. Much too big for my Pekingese and very hard. However company refunded my money which is good customer service. I will donate item to Animal Shelter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Safe Treats
customer_reviews.text: My dogs enjoy these. Great to have something that keeps them occupied for a while without worrying about th hurting their digestive systems or getting pieces caught in their throats. Although I never leave them unattended when they have treats, these don’t give me reason to worry.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Clark Browne

customer_reviews.title: Dogs Favorite
customer_reviews.text: This is my pets favorite treat. I have several kinds of bones and treats but this is the treat that occupies her for a while as we eat our dinner in peace. I highly recommend trying this digestible raw hide treat.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Kassel

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these bones, and they’ve never caused any digestion problems (even with my oldest dog). My last order was somehow lost, but customer service was very helpful and sent a replacement the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Dev clark

customer_reviews.title: Caused Severe GI Upset!
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the reviews! My dog vomited, and had diarrhea all night after consuming one of these. It’s the only time she’s had a GI upset like this, and there was nothing different in her diet, so I firmly believe it was this.

customer_reviews.title: Safer than Rawhide
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these after trying the smaller package. No odor, and all three enjoy them, although the enthusiasm waxes and wanes. That's typical of any kind of longer lasting chewy in our household. There have never been any digestive issues. That is a HUGE plus, especially since one has a delicate system. No staining on carpets or bedding.
customer_reviews.author: ShannonOnTheLakes

customer_reviews.title: Better Belly Rawhide Bones, Great Digestibility Rawhide Chews for Dogs
customer_reviews.text: Better Belly Rawhide Bones, Great Digestibility Rawhide Chews for Dogs. Price is more then half less then at local pet stores. This bone is easy on the stomach for dogs that have stomach issues.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Maloney

customer_reviews.title: Better belly bones
customer_reviews.text: Dog loves these and they don’t upset his belly like other bones do. I used to buy them at petsmart but they don’t carry them anymore. I’d rather get on Amazon anyway because same product is more affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Mistie Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Liquid Diarrhea, need I say more?
customer_reviews.text: Definity not "Better Belly". My dog enjoyed the bone, however next day suffered from vomiting & liquid diarrhea. This was not pleasant to come home to after working all day :( No way will I buy again.
customer_reviews.author: cujosmom2

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love them!
customer_reviews.text: They can be a little more expensive that some other rawhides, but our dogs love them. They get stomach aches when we give them regular rawhides, so if you're dog has a sensitive stomach then these are a great alternative. Our dogs chew them in about 10 minutes, but it's a great treat and seems to help their teeth.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: Dogs love it!! Our Goldens are 60# and 90# respectively. Only give them one of these "small" bones at night before bed. They can't wait to get to the bedroom!!
customer_reviews.author: RFMeaux

customer_reviews.title: NOW MADE IN VIETNAM
customer_reviews.text: Returned the last two bags. These first were made in the USA but these were not. Since the FDA does not inspect or approve out of USA dog treats, I won't be feeding them to my cherished pets.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Both my dogs got very sick cost alot at vet not happy
customer_reviews.author: craig

customer_reviews.title: Chihuahua heaven treats! My 5 lb Chi LOVES these!
customer_reviews.text: My pups all time favorite treats! Takes her anywhere from 1-4 days to chew it down to a 1" nub that I give to my big dog as a little snack.
customer_reviews.author: PDX_Steph

customer_reviews.title: Dog likes them but expensive
customer_reviews.text: Dog likes them. They don't give him diarrhea like other products. I just think they are too expensive for their size otherwise would have give more stars
customer_reviews.author: The Happy or Unhappy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Great sticks
customer_reviews.text: These sticks were great for a special treat for the puppies. The only thing about these sticks are that they do not last very long like original raw hides do.
customer_reviews.author: TAG

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in new hollow rolls
customer_reviews.text: My shiz tzu loves these but I’m very disappointed the latest bag now the rolls are hollow and he can eat them in an hour. They were always solid and lasted a Long time. Feeling like if this is permanent I won’t be buying anymore.
customer_reviews.author: champion

customer_reviews.title: Dog Chews, Just OK
customer_reviews.text: My dogs could take or leave these. I do think my dogs are particularly picky. I buy lots of treats; many which they do not eat. These are not a favorite at my house.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Shafer

customer_reviews.title: Pups love them
customer_reviews.text: My pups love these. After we do a long day of exercising our pups we give them their treats.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: ThickAsAsnickers
customer_reviews.text: These are thicker than i expected maybe an inch wide. Gave to my Miniature Pinscher twice. Each time he was bloated for days and his stomach was firm to touch, so they just aren't for him.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great digestible product!
customer_reviews.text: My little rescue LOVES these! These are her favorites right now. She unrolls them and they last a long time. I take it away from her after about 15 minutes. It lasts about 4 days.
customer_reviews.author: Kevon

customer_reviews.title: Dogs won't eat them
customer_reviews.text: My dog is picky so I wasn't surprised when she wouldn't eat these but my boyfriend's dog will eat literally anything and had no desire to eat these at all. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Revette

customer_reviews.title: Chicken sticks
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these they last about one or two days for him he's only 11 lb. Safe for him there digestible and he just loves his chicken sticks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Puppy Threw Up
customer_reviews.text: My puppy ate like 1/4 of the bone and started throwing up. Not sure if she had a reaction or what but she threw up 3 times after eating it. So not impressed honestly
customer_reviews.author: Eli L

customer_reviews.title: Gentler
customer_reviews.text: These are easier to digest for my dog and don’t cause bleeding. And he LOVES them! Satisfies the chewing need at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: LOK

customer_reviews.title: my pit bull loves these
customer_reviews.text: my dog loves these so much and they keep him busy for about 30 mins lol he’s an aggressive chewer so these don’t last long at all, this three pack lasted a day and a half. they’re very easy on his stomach and i never worry about them choking him. i love this brand and would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Brookelyn

customer_reviews.title: Great value and good for puppy!
customer_reviews.text: My puppy has been chewing everything like crazy! This helped a lot, it's tough enough to give my puppy the biting satisfaction he needs. It doesn't dissolve easily which is a good thing. Over all I would recommend this product.👍
customer_reviews.author: agnes

customer_reviews.title: Happy dogs
customer_reviews.text: My pups enjoy these treats! They keep them busy for about 20 minutes. No one is sick afterward either.
customer_reviews.author: GL

customer_reviews.title: My puppy loved them, and I loved that I didnt have ...
customer_reviews.text: My puppy loved them, and I loved that I didnt have to worry about rawhide in his intestinal system. The downside is that they didn't last long. My 7 lb puppy was able to tear through one of them in 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J. Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love them!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these!! They don’t last long in terms of chew time but my dogs adore these as special treats. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: These lasted way longer than bully sticks, and without the odor! Bonus. I have 3 dogs, Labrador mixes, and they all loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love them!
customer_reviews.text: Our pups love them and NO digestive issues. Our dogs prefer these over actual rawhide bones! These are a win, win!!
customer_reviews.author: MFinch149

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love them!
customer_reviews.text: All three of my dog love these!! I’ve tried lots of different rawhide but these are their favorite. I wish they came in a larger bag!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive tummies
customer_reviews.text: They gave our Boston Terriers diarrhea for days on end. They weren’t sick otherwise- playing, eating, etc. but runny poop for far too long. Did keep them busy though- if your dogs don’t have sensitive tummies and they are heavy chewers, most chew treats only last a few minutes with these two
customer_reviews.author: Scullen

customer_reviews.title: Overall okay
customer_reviews.text: Dogs loved these, but gave them irregular poop color and could be easily choked on. Have to watch your dog very carefully while eating these
customer_reviews.author: Colie828

customer_reviews.title: Watch Carefully When Being Chewed
customer_reviews.text: Taffe loves them, but, per vet we had to quit giving them to her. She chews straight thru the middle; had rough weekend trying to straighten her bowels out.
customer_reviews.author: TaffeT

customer_reviews.title: Would have loved a sample
customer_reviews.text: My dog hates them. In defense of the company they are big and maybe somebody else’s dog might like that for me it was a complete and total waste.
customer_reviews.author: marsha heisley

customer_reviews.title: Buy them all the time and my pup loves them
customer_reviews.text: My pup loves these. This is her favorite snack. I love how it’s a good alternative for a regular raw hide bone
customer_reviews.author: Lys

customer_reviews.title: Very enjoyable for my dog, but not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: My 40lbs dog made it through one of these in less then half an hour. She obviously enjoyed it, but I wish it would have lasted a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: My puppy loves these
customer_reviews.text: My puppy absolutely LOVES these. Better deal here than the pet shop. Will be purchasing again for sure. A+++
customer_reviews.author: Melissa o'hearn

customer_reviews.title: Great experience
customer_reviews.text: Seems like my dogs love them and I'm glad they're better for their bellies!! I'll be buying more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Long

customer_reviews.title: My doggie fav rawhide free bones
customer_reviews.text: Seriously my maltipoo/shihtzu’s favorite bone. He loves everything chicken flavor, and rawhide free bones digest the best for his sensitive tummy. Never had issues, the big bag lasted! Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Panchita

customer_reviews.title: Best for dogs with sensitive tummies but love to chew
customer_reviews.text: Best chewing for my dog and his sensitive stomach. They don’t stink or melt on carpets or furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to chew and digest for a small dog
customer_reviews.text: My little pup loves them! They are much easier for her to chew on and get rewarded with little bites.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty

customer_reviews.title: Not a good value
customer_reviews.text: Although these bones appear to be a good value, the flavor and aroma are so faint my dog wouldn’t take them. I have to soak them in chicken broth overnight and air dry all day before he will try them. And he rarely finishes one. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: K. Black

customer_reviews.title: My Dog Loves Them!
customer_reviews.text: My terrier has a lot of food allergies, but he can eat these rawhide rolls without problem. I appreciate how digestible they are, and my dog appreciates the flavor. We're both happy!
customer_reviews.author: Bigmommabird

customer_reviews.title: Great safe bones
customer_reviews.text: These are the only kind of bones that we will feed our Boston terrier. She can handle about one every other day or so. They don’t stink or stain.
customer_reviews.author: kingdomjourney

product_meta.title: Better Belly Rawhide Bones, Great Digestibility Rawhide Chews for Dogs, No Grain, Gluten Free, No Artifical Colors or Flavors
product_meta.description: Style:Chicken Liver| Size:Small | 20-CountBetter Belly digests two times faster than standard rawhide*. Better digestion for your dog means more peace of mind for you. Free of fillers, binders and artificial colors; these are sure to become your pooch's favorite new chew. Standard rawhide is made of millions of collagen fibers that link together makinge the hide tough abut flexible. Better Belly's patented technology breaks down the collagen fibers to make digestion quick and easy. Each chew is gluten free and breaks down easily and rapidly to help reduce the incidents of blockage within your dog's digestive tract. Better Belly Small Rolls give your pup a uniquely shaped chew with original chicken liver flavor they love. Treat any size dog to these digestible rolls and zip bag to close and preserve freshness. finding the perfect chew that both you and your dog can love can be difficult, but Better Belly chews are here to make it easier. Always supervise your dog during consumption of chews.
feature_bullets: No Fillers, Binders Or Artificial Colors
